channel.title: Comments on: Crostata con la Crema – Daring Bakers Challenge November 2010

item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description: Wow! Your Crostata looks so pretty. You did a brilliant job! I was sad to have to sit this one out but will be back for the December challenge. Can't wait to see what you do :) Merry Christmas!
item.content:encoded: Wow! Your Crostata looks so pretty. You did a brilliant job! I was sad to have to sit this one out but will be back for the December challenge. Can’t wait to see what you do ðŸ™‚ Merry Christmas!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Lovely job, Anita! I think I could eat a bowl of pastry cream every night for dessert, if I dared!
item.content:encoded: Lovely job, Anita! I think I could eat a bowl of pastry cream every night for dessert, if I dared!

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
This is super luscious... crostata with pastry cream from Portugese tarts. Gosh those are my fav too!
And blueberries with strawberries sitting on a bed of bright yellow pastry cream is an appetizing sight!
item.content:encoded:
This is super luscious… crostata with pastry cream from Portugese tarts. Gosh those are my fav too!

And blueberries with strawberries sitting on a bed of bright yellow pastry cream is an appetizing sight!

item.title: By: Simona
item.dc:creator: Simona
item.description: Your crostata looks very nice. I like the combination pastry cream and berries.
item.content:encoded: Your crostata looks very nice. I like the combination pastry cream and berries.

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Beautiful job on the challenge! Your crostata looks wonderful, and that fruit! Winter is just starting here, and the snow falling out my window while I stare at your beautiful fresh fruit is pure torture! Lovely job!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful job on the challenge! Your crostata looks wonderful, and that fruit! Winter is just starting here, and the snow falling out my window while I stare at your beautiful fresh fruit is pure torture! Lovely job!

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: It looks so fab Anita! Well done on another great challenge :)
item.content:encoded: It looks so fab Anita! Well done on another great challenge ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: chef_d
item.dc:creator: chef_d
item.description: Wow that's a gorgeous looking crostata. I had a bit of a problem with the crust too and I added water. Love the fruits on top of your crostata, great job!
item.content:encoded: Wow that’s a gorgeous looking crostata. I had a bit of a problem with the crust too and I added water. Love the fruits on top of your crostata, great job!

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: Looks delicious and very elegant with the berries
item.content:encoded: Looks delicious and very elegant with the berries

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: This looks so lovely and makes me nostalgic for Spring/Summer (it is windy and cold where I am).
item.content:encoded: This looks so lovely and makes me nostalgic for Spring/Summer (it is windy and cold where I am).

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: Your crostata looks delicious! It is so strange sometimes to read about spring when we are in the midst of fall/winter. I hope you get many uses our of your berries, they look lovely. Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: Your crostata looks delicious! It is so strange sometimes to read about spring when we are in the midst of fall/winter. I hope you get many uses our of your berries, they look lovely. Nice job on the challenge!
